Package thothbot.parallax.core.client.shaders

Here are all shaders and shader's related code.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Chunks
    Source for all chunks.
    Shader.DefaultResources  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Attribute  
    BasicShader
    Basic shader.
    ChunksFragmentShader
    Chunks used in Fragment Shader
    ChunksVertexShader
    Chunks used in Vertex Shader
    CubeShader
    CubeGeometry map shader.
    DashedShader  
    DepthRGBAShader
    Depth encoding into RGBA texture.
    DepthShader
    Simple depth shader.
    FresnelShader
    Fresnel shader.
    LambertShader
    Lambert shader.
    NormalMapShader
    Normal map shader
    - Blinn-Phong
    - normal + diffuse + specular + AO + displacement + reflection + shadow maps
    - point and directional lights (use with "lights: true" material option) Based on three.js code.
    NormalShader
    Normal shader.
    ParticleBasicShader
    Simple Particle shader.
    PhongShader
    Phong shading - lighting model three-dimensional objects, including models and polygonal primitives.
    ProgramParameters  
    Shader
    Basic abstract shader.
    Uniform
    Shader's uniforms.
    UniformsLib
    Some common uniforms used by shaders.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Attribute.BOUND_TO  
    Attribute.TYPE  
    Shader.PRECISION
    Sets the Shaders precision value.
    Uniform.TYPE
